scripts.run:dev: yarn pm2:stop && pm2 flush && pm2 start src/server/server.js --watch --env development --node-args="--debug=5858" --log-date-format="YYYY-MM-DD HH:mm:ss" --interpreter babel-node && pm2 logs
scripts.run:dev-cluster: yarn pm2:stop && pm2 flush && pm2 start src/server/server.js -i 0 --watch --env development --node-args="--debug=5858" --log-date-format="YYYY-MM-DD HH:mm:ss" --interpreter babel-node && pm2 logs
scripts.run:prod: yarn pm2:stop && yarn build:both && pm2 flush && pm2 start build/server/server.js --env production --log-date-format="YYYY-MM-DD HH:mm:ss" && pm2 logs
scripts.run:prod-cluster: yarn pm2:stop && yarn build:both && pm2 flush && pm2 start build/server/server.js -i 0 --env production --log-date-format="YYYY-MM-DD HH:mm:ss" && pm2 logs
scripts.run:prod-debug: yarn pm2:stop && yarn build:both && pm2 flush && pm2 start build/server/server.js --watch --env development --node-args="--debug=5858" --log-date-format="YYYY-MM-DD HH:mm:ss" && pm2 logs
scripts.run:prod-debug-cluster: yarn pm2:stop && yarn build:both && pm2 flush && pm2 start build/server/server.js -i 0 --watch --env development --node-args="--debug=5858" --log-date-format="YYYY-MM-DD HH:mm:ss" && pm2 logs
scripts.run:prod-node: yarn pm2:stop && yarn build:both && NODE_ENV=production node build/server/server.js
scripts.run:prod-babel: yarn pm2:stop && yarn build:both && NODE_ENV=production babel-node build/server/server.js
scripts.pm2:update: yarn global add pm2@latest && pm2 update
scripts.remove:all: yarn remove:build && yarn remove:packages && yarn remove:coverage && yarn remove:snapshots
scripts.install:global: yarn global add pm2@latest flow-bin@latest babel-cli@latest
scripts.install:prod: yarn add babel-runtime express react react-dom
scripts.install:dev: yarn add --dev jest babel-jest stylelint eslint eslint-plugin-react babel-eslint babel-core babel-plugin-transform-runtime babel-plugin-transform-es2015-modules-commonjs babel-preset-latest babel-preset-flow babel-preset-react babel-preset-stage-2 webpack webpack-dev-middleware webpack-hot-middleware babel-loader react-hot-loader style-loader css-loader postcss-loader precss
scripts.install:all: yarn install:global && yarn install:prod && yarn install:dev
